Downloaded on 2016-03-17 from: 

https://github.com/cyotek/Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox

Commit: b22b0bd83822f51b8929c52c6550d257a6ee725a

Downloaded the whole respository as a zip file, unzipped, then opened Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox.sln in Visual Studio 2013 for Windows Desktop.
Changed to 'Release', clicked rebuild all, and then got the DLL from Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ImageBox\bin\Release
